article_title: John Roberts to America: I'm in Charge Here

article_metadata.description: When, just over two years ago, right-wing superlawyer Michael Carvin filed his first lawsuit seeking to deny Affordable Care Act tax credits to millions of individuals in states with federally operated exchanges, die-hard ACA opponents saw one reason why the Supreme Court might use an isolated four-word phrase to sabotage the ACA—that all five conservative justices would vote their political gut. ...

og.description: The chief justice's Obamacare opinion is part of his plan to make the Supreme Court the final decider on the nation’s most divisive policy issues.
